name: Hungry Red Box
description:
CONTROLS:

Go left = A, left arrow

Go right = D, right arrow

Jump = W, up arrow, space

Playing in full screen mode is recommended if you're on browser.

DESCRIPTION:

Once one of many, now a big red box. Its gluttony knows no bounds, coming to devour its own kind. Save as many innocent red capsules as possible.

Submission to Minimalist Game Jam #1
